page.title: 18A VILLAGE YEAR.
page.content: At{Christmas time}in the village hall the social club has a Christmas dance. The school P.T.A. have a family disco and a party for the children. The church is decorated with green leaves and we have a carol service there.Some of us go round carol singing to collect for charity.At school we play netball and football. In the{Summer} we play rounders. There is a Church fete in Summer.We used to have it at Greys farm but this year we are having it at the old vicarage. At the school we have a Summer concert and a school barbecue. In{Autumn}we have a Harvest service in the church. We take over flowers,fruit and vegetables and decorate the church with them.
